website_summaries.verdict: By far the best deal available. It's less costly than others we reviewed, but is still a high-quality option.
pros: Boasts a soft, silky material and down-alternative fill that is lightweight but warm
Offers similar quality to others we reviewed but at a lower price
cons: Doesn't have the feel of real goose down fill, but you probably won't mind when you consider the price

website_summaries.verdict: This machine washable, hypoallergenic option beats competitors for softness and ease of care.
pros: Comforter keeps sleepers warm but not hot
It is hypoallergenic for those who love the feel of down, but cannot sleep under it
cons: Comforter does not come with loops for a duvet cover

customer_reviews.title: Moldy when opened
customer_reviews.text: Covered in black mold from a vacuum sealed bag so it must have been packaged when wet, but this is absolutely disgusting
customer_reviews.author: Krista A.

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed after one week
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could write a positive review about this. The few days I managed to have it on my bed, it was a very comfortable product. After seeing some of the negative reviews about washing it, I was skeptical about how the people washed it and was sure to explicitly follow the care instructions. Came home to a washer full of fluff. So disappointed - would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: (Not so) Best Comforter Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so super soft and fluffy! I absolutely love it. I hate getting out of my bed now! I want to spend all day wrapped in this terrifically soft comforter. It's absolutely perfect. Has tiny tabs on each corner to keep in place inside of a duvet. *Update- The comforter tore open when I washed it! It's almost as if the outer material disintegrated. It was such a wonderful comforter before that. I'm really upset that this happened, but I dont want to waste my money to buy a replacement that I won't be able to wash at home. I've never had this happen before.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: this cloud-like duvet is sooo comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to break my bank when I got a new bed set but I was worried that buying the cheaper product would result in less comfort. I was wrong! this cloud-like duvet is sooo comfortable and soft. It is light and heavy at the same time in that you feel that sense of security that a blanket gives you, but it doesn't make you wish you were dead in the summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Not poofy after washing
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is good for the first few washes. When it first came it was super poofy. But after 2 washes, it's a lot flatter. It still keeps warm at night but I just wish it stayed poofy. UPDATE: Make sure that when and if you do clean it, take it to a laundromat and use a large side loading washer. My home washer ripped a huge whole :(
customer_reviews.author: BukoJuice

customer_reviews.title: Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: I’m disgusted! I just received the package and although it seems to be new and in a vacuum sealed plastic bag, there are several bugs that look like maybe mosquitoes that are sealed with the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: MIRANDA L. MCANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: It's super light, it felt like I didn't even have ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too hot!! It's super light, it felt like I didn't even have a comforter on! I prefer a comforter with a little more weight to it, something that feels like it's "hugging" me. The stuffing doesn't allow any air circulation at all. It felt as though it just trapped my body heat. My old comforter kept me cool in the summer and warm in the winter but this comforter is just HOT.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I received this product on a Thursday, washed and dried it properly and on Sunday noticed the threads were falling apart....and that's even with not using it for one night. So very disappointing, but for this I guess, as the saying goes, you get what you pay for. I had high hopes for this product, much too bad.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😍
customer_reviews.text: This comforter has been a great replacement for my old Eddie Bauer goose down. It was almost 10 years old, the feathers were sliding around in it and even on really cold nights, it was uncomfortably warm. I pulled this new one out of is box, gave it a wash and shoved it into my duvet. I could feel the difference immediately. It's lighter but still comfortably toasty and plush. Woke up the next morning and I just didn't want to get out of bed. This is perfect for me. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C

customer_reviews.title: Became VERY damaged after first machine wash!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, put it in the wash before using it and it came out VERY damaged. It looks like a wood chipper got to it (look at pictures) I am VERY disappointed because the description says this is machine washable! :( I was really excited to use this, I am so upset right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corner ripped/shredded up after first wash
customer_reviews.text: I am bummed that this blanket didn’t work out because it seemed really nice and plush when it first came out of the box. However, after it’s first wash, one of the corners ripped badly. It looked like someone had taken a razor to it. Not only that, there was this brownish/blackish mildewy looking stain that was left exposed on the inside of the duvet. Extremely disgusting. Cheap product. The funny thing is, I read other reviews warning of this same problem, but I figured it wouldn’t happen to me, or that other reviewers were just exaggerating. Whelp, I should have listened. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: All ready unraveling on its own, have not washed it. We have not even had it for a month and its already falling appart.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are okay they both were different in fluffy-ness but I ordered 2 of the same size
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy but made me sweat
customer_reviews.text: Melted first time I washed it. Super comfy but made me sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Preaker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would not recommend this comforter. Purchased and after the first wash it totally fell apart. The stictching and materials were cheaply made and totally fell apart. Washed on delicate by itself in cold water and this is what happened. Not happy and definitely would NOT recommend if your looking for a comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Swaney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a Yellow Stain
customer_reviews.text: There was a yellow stain you could see right through the vacuum seal bag it came in. Since there are many reviews stating the comforter came with mold or foul smelling yellow stains, when I saw the stain I didn't even open the vacuum sealed bag and returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: pattio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this comforter when I received a duvet for my bday. I didn't want to spend too much but I also didn't want to go too cheap either and miss out on a quality comforter! So glad I went with this one!! Super fluffy, super comfortable! Exact fit for the duvet with handy ties at each corner to assist with keeping it put inside the duvet. Super satisfied with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Prime2018

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY !
customer_reviews.text: Came covered in mold ! Gross!!I was so excited to get this but it is covered in mold !Don't buy. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with mold
customer_reviews.text: Despite several reviews that the comforter had arrived to people's homes moldy, I still took the risk and ordered two as there were so many positive reviews about this product. Unfortunately, sure enough, one arrived with a small mold stain in the corner of the comforter. As I am highly allergic to mold and dust, the product will clearly not work for me. I will be returning it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef

customer_reviews.title: Huge!! Marshmallow!! Cloud!!
customer_reviews.text: Too puffy! Didn’t fit in my duvet cover I bought I for. I took it out of the box and it grew like five sizes. Then to return it I had to buy a new box. Like a huge box. I couldn’t cram it in the tiny box it came it. So I think that’s probably good for someone who wants a super extra fluffy blanket. But it won’t fit in my cover :(
customer_reviews.author: jessi & sky

customer_reviews.title: Mold spots everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited on getting this comforter but got it with mold. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Came with dead BEDBUGS in package!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, immediately returning it. Upon unfolding the comforter I found parts of the comforter were yellowed and there was even a bedbug on the comforter. It was dead but I'm not taking the risk that they wake up now that the vacuum seal has been released.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Came apart during very first wash! Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Came apart during its first wash! Have washed my old comforter many times and it’s held up just fine. We have a newer washer and dryer that has never caused any issues so I know it’s the quality of this comforter, which is unfortunate because it was very large and soft. Will be attempting to get a refund for sure
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Hotter Than Hades
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this duvet insert. However, after one night of attempting to sleep under it, I loathed it. This thing is heavy, bulky, felt like a boat-tarp on top of me, and made me feel like I was roasting in the oven like a turkey. I cannot stand to be hot at night when I'm sleeping, and this thing had me sweating like a stuck pig. I finally threw it off of me at 3 a.m. to go get another blanket. Returned it today. Would not recommend unless you like broiling. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: michaeldj5

customer_reviews.title: MOLDY?!
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, I also recieved a moldy duvet. It was visible through the vaccuum sealed inner wrapping. Poor QC. Will not buy this Duvet again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Looks like mold issues that previous reviewers reported are still a ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like mold issues that previous reviewers reported are still a problem. I just received mine on 11/29/17 and noticed mold spores on it. I didnt even have to open up the plastic seal to see it from the outside. How is this even possible? I promptly returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Kuster

customer_reviews.title: So warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. I read a lot of reviews and there was one that stuck with me. This woman said it reminded her of something from the dollar store. Wow. Well my dollar store does not sell comforters so....but yea I have had for about a month and there is a little [very little] fraying at a few seams. So maybe...but my gawd is the thing WARM and so lightweight! I don't get how it does that! I know it made to put a cover on but I wanted the white so no cover for me. If you are looking for a warm basic inexpensive comforter don't hesitate on this one! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Scott

customer_reviews.title: I bought this duvet insert and was excited to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this duvet insert and was excited to get it, especially for the price. Well as soon as it arrived, I opened it only to find that it does NOT have the loops in the corners so it can be tied to the duvet so it doesn't slide and shift out of place. The picture shows that it has them and a couple of reviews also said, it has the loops.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these. I originally bought for my guest room and then I need 2 for my twins. They sleep soooo cozily that my husband and I decided to try one for our bed. We absolutely love it. My boys just turned 3 yo so I wash their covers a LOT and haven't had a single quality issue. Some of the other reviews are awful but all 4 of mine are wonderful and I'm about to order a 5th because my MIL is staying with us for a little while. I wonder if the size makes a difference.. we have 3 Twins and 1 Cal King, about to order a regular king.
customer_reviews.author: A. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned as soon as I opened up the package, it was extremely small in the bag for being a king size down alternative comforter, especially comparing it to how fluffy and full it looks in the picture. It was vacuum sealed so I assumed it would fluff up after but it hasn’t. There’s also stuffing coming out of many of the seams. The fabric is a bit rough, not good for summer weather, but I assume it would be nice to keep you warm in winter. All in all, took a chance on this product and now I’m just going to have to use it as a backup comforter I think.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Soft but thin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this down alternative duvet insert to stuff inside a duvet cover with my luxurious fluffy premium cocoon brand goose down duvet insert (purchased here on Amazon as well). Stuffing the two duvets into my duvet cover maximized the fluffiness I was looking for and created a Wow effect on my luxury bedmaking styles. I also use the duvets as a topper to lay on at times. It’s like sleeping on a cloud! If you buy I recommend you double stuff your duvet cover with a 2nd goose down duvet. Sleep on top of it during the summer and snuggle under it during those cold winter nights :) Photos attached...
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Very good comforter!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good comforter for all season! Pros: - True to size - Warm - Lightweight - Comfortable Cons: - fillers at the corner tends to go off (but that's not big of a deal) - Pilling or bobbling, yes, this is not full cotton so pills are very hard and irritating so get a lint diffuser as well if you didn't have it already, it's a cheap and useful device and can be used on your other clothes as well. Verdict: Go for it , I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Saad A.

customer_reviews.title: Too hot for 'all season'
customer_reviews.text: I keep waking up sweating since I've started using this. I have a window AC unit in this room. This king size duvet insert is filled with synthetic materials and just doesn't breathe at all. Combine that with a waterproof mattress pad under my cotton sheets, and I wake up sweaty feeling like I've been wrapped in plastic wrap or something. I've ordered a new cover for it, if that helps I'll update the rating and note here if I have done so.
customer_reviews.author: W805

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: pleasantly surprised. We were going to just buy a cheap one from Walmart and took the chance with this. It is very soft and comfy, reminds me of a down feather comforter. After reading other reviews i wanted to be careful washing it. Common sense - washed on gentle - dried on low. Nothing wrong. Love this comforter now if I can just keep the dog away from it
customer_reviews.author: AshleyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this I was nervous because I didn't read the reviews before buying. DUVET INSERT? What is that and what have I bought!? Were my first questions. Thankfully, none of that matters as this can be used AS IS. This white, down comforter is soft, warm, and luxuriating. Even though it's thinner than I'm used to, I would say it's much warmer than the other down comforters I have bought previously. I absolutely love it (so does my husband) and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Elle's Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Navy color is not navy, but it's very soft and comfy! :)
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and fluffy. I'm grateful to have a new comforter, but the color is not exact just like other users posted.... it's not a navy blue, it's more like a teal / grey. If the company just updated their picture and description it would be easier for purchasers. I'm still going to keep it. Giving 4 stars because I don't want to be mean.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: My teenage son had a comforter that he loved unfortunately it had done it time
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son had a comforter that he loved unfortunately it had done it time. I asked him to pick out a comforter that he like. We researched for the great reviews and awesome prices. My concern was it had to keep him warm enough as the thermostat was kept at 65 while we slept. My son loves this comforter and, so far he says he is toasty and warm with a perfect night's sleep. He appreciates the way it looks as we also bought the matching sheet set to suit. This is has been such a success, I bought a second one for my oldest son who is in college.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lightweight insert, I love it and I have been sleeping really well with it. I needed something that was light weight because I was too hot in the summer and this is perfect, but still fluffy and cute when the bed is made. My only complaint is the corner tabs are so tiny it’s hard to connect it with the corner ties of my cover. However if you opt to not have a cover on it they’re very low profile and you’d never notice them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Very little stuffing & not enough tie loops
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in this purchase. Had to wait longer to get this one shipped and paid twice as much for it. But thought it would be worth it. I believed it would be fuller & fluffier than the less expensive ones. But I was wrong!!! It is sooo very little stuffing. Also it doesn’t have but 4 loops to anchor in duvet. My Pottery Barn duvet has 8 ties to keep it place. Will have to rethink about using this company again. It was packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: MOLD- SEVERE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM. NEVER IN MY LIFE HAVE I RETURNED AN ITEM OR EVEN LEFT A REVIEW but within minutes of opening the box lips throat and tongue began to swell with trouble breathing. Clearly had high concentration of mold as when my sister came to get me as soon as she walked in my room same thing happened to her. Looked at some bad reviews and they found black mold as well. Even after removing it from my house and room And turning on air purifier, I went to wash my sheets where the insert was laying on top of and i broke out into a rash from the mold spores that we’re now on my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: alexas gaudet

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the other one I ordered before.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I had ordered another one of the same product earlier and it was excellent. This is not the same at all. This item had fabric so lightweight that it was damaged on the first washing. It's just too thin it's not acceptable for use as bedding. I wish that I could consistently buy the same products here on Amazon. This is not the same as the other comforter that I've had and I clicked on the exact same link to order it.
customer_reviews.author: Famous Filmmaker

customer_reviews.title: Stained but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I loved the softness of it but the only thing was, after washing it and putting it on my bed, I noticed some stains that were clearly NOT from me. This comforter went from the nicely vacuum sealed bag to my washing machine then on my bed. Very disappointing. I know I have the choice to mail it back but I really don’t have time for these things, if I did I would have gone shopping to local retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Evangelia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight Warm Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight and keeps you plenty warm. My only complaint is that after washing just once little fibers started showing/poking through on the black side. No fibers on the grey side. After a second wash, the fibers were less with no matting or bunching of material within the comforter itself. Possibly the fibers just need to settle after a few washes, but in the meantime poses as a slight eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you’re the right person for this comforter
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and very, VERY warm. Almost too warm...I have mine inside a cover so that’s why I didn’t mind going with a polyester fill. If you have it uncovered or have pets, be aware that this stains extremely easily and if you wash it inside a machine washer it may tear. Luckily I put mine on a gentle cycle and all seems to be well, but I’ve seen other reviews where it will tear.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these comforters, after buying the grey and white trellis Utopia comforters. These are not nearly as soft and fluffy as the previous comforters, and are more like a grey blanket. The color is a nice medium grey and they are a great value, however they're just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Swab

customer_reviews.title: ITS SO FLUFFY
customer_reviews.text: Me and my S.O. have been needing new comforters for a while now and we used to use one for each of us (We roll alot and were afraid we'd steal the covers from one another. PROBLEM SOLVED BECAUSE LET ME TELL YOU THIS, THESE THINGS ARE SO DANG BIG AND FLUFFY THEY WILL CONSUME ALL!!! When the bed is unmade it looks like a mountain lion is hiding under them, when only our cat is laying on top of it, and she looks like she's on a homemade fort (no dogs allowed, of course)
customer_reviews.author: John Bates

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt sure what to expect. But pleasantly surprised. This duvet is light weight but super soft and warm. I'm not sweating in my sleep but I'm cozy. It's super easy to clean as well. Wash on a gently cycle and dry on low. Takes awhile to dry but comes clean and fluffs back up no problem. Its alittle thinner than I had hoped but again does the job well with half the thickness. I highly recomend. This seems like it's going to work well for winter AND summer. If you're looking for a weighted duvet this is NOT it. But if your looking for lightweight warmth and cozy.. definately recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Salas

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, and warm as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is soft, comfortable and warm. I would recommend purchasing this product. My following comment is not meant to detract from the quality of the product at all as it is terrific. In case anyone is wondering, I would not suggest using this comforter during the summer. It does really well when it comes to keeping one warm, and that's a good thing plus a positive in favor of the comforter. There may be lighter-weight options more suitable for the hot season. As I am writing this review, cold weather has rolled in and now I don't have this hot season "issue". Again, I would recommend this product to readers and to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F.

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm! Hang dry it.
customer_reviews.text: REALLY WARM, which is great for Alaska. Definitely insulates body heat more than our old alternative down. We upgraded to a King size even though our bed's a Queen as the dogs kept stealing all the blanket. Warning, I would not place this in a regular homestyle dryer. We even have the large cubic feet style, and it was too big, burning small sections. It washed okay, although it was pretty packed in there. We now hang dry it, and it dries by the end of the day, so pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Seabiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a BBB comforter that was sadly torn up during a recent wash. Didn't want to spend another $129 on a replacement, so I bought this after reading a few reviews. I was surprised at how lightweight, yet comfortable, this one was. Just slept overnight and didn't find myself uncovering in the middle of the night. It wasn't overly hot, and my wife also loved how much softer this one was. I'm going to be buying another one for our guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Samrio

customer_reviews.title: Warm at first, but tore open right away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this comforter about two months ago. I was looking for something warm, going into winter, and this comforter does provide warmth. The problem is—it lacks quality. While the instructions say it is machine washable, I was trying to avoid putting it in the washing machine because I read another review which said doing so could tear it open. Despite taking this precaution, only a couple of months after purchasing, it started tearing open all on its own. I did not expect this product to last a lifetime, but I expected it to last a lot longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Paulhus

customer_reviews.title: Utterly disgusting
customer_reviews.text: The comforter was moldy and stained within its packaging. Utterly disgusting. I sent it back immediately and will not be purchasing another. Revolting.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Berger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Black/Gray Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more pleased with Utopia’s Bed Comforter! I ordered a black/gray twin size for my Son’s bed. He loves it! I’m impressed! It’s made with the perfect material to make it warm & soft yet lightweight. It held up beautifully for 1st wash. Came out of the dryer wrinkle free. It looks wonderful on his bed. Very little wrinkles after a night’s sleep. It has no flimsiness to it whatsoever. Making his bed is much more easier with a good solid comforter. I will surely look at Utopia again for my next comforter purchase! Thank you for a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Basic Insert
customer_reviews.text: For a duvet insert that I couldn’t feel before purchasing, I did pretty good. However, it’s much different from my last insert which had a more feathery-feel. At first, out of the box, it kind of disappointed me but after opening it, putting it inside its cover and using it for a couple weeks I am pleased with it. I think the biggest difference between this one and my last one is the breathability - this one makes me super hot even with the AC on which may or may not get old fast. It will do for now but I will definitely invest in another insert down the road.
customer_reviews.author: quinnsmom

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, warm and breezy!
customer_reviews.text: I was really blown away with this product given its price - it's easy to wash and is not disturbed through the cycle of either washing or drying. I would highly recommend this to anyone, especially college students that may be on the lookout for an affordable and stylish tufted white blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived on time and I don't have any complaints. Last night was my first time using the duvet insert, which was easy enough to slip inside the cover. It was funny to see the comforter fluff instantly once I sliced open the vacuum sealed packaging. It seems like it will be warm enough coupled with the flannel cover I put it inside of. I will say there is a slight chemical smell that came with it, but it was not as intense as the smell of the sheet set and cover I purchased to go with this (ordered through Amazon's Pinzon brand).
customer_reviews.author: des

customer_reviews.title: like a cozy cloud
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is the blanket I’ve been looking for. It is super soft and snuggly, I got the king size for our queen bed and it fits well, large enough for two people to burrito up in it. It does come vacuum sealed, so letting it open and fluff up- I just stuck in it the dryer for a bit. I really love this comforter. It’s definitely not down- but you can machine wash it, it’s cozy enough for summer and warm enough for New England winters. Seriously fluffy. Soft feel, lovely red color. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Soft, lightweight, feather-free duvet insert with corner attachments
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly. The insert is compressed and will plump up when removed from the package. It is very soft and light, but will provide good warmth. It's feather-free and good for those of us with allergies. I did wash it before I used it because there was a slight odor to it that came out completely once it was laundered. Fits our duvet covers well and has attachments on each corner to secure it inside. I am happy with this product and will buy another king size insert for my other bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: digitalpixi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this comforter! We use a cover and just used this comforter alone. It’s warm and light at the same time. It’ll be perfect for summer. I saw a lot of reviews saying theirs got ruined in the washer so we will probably be taking it to the dry cleaners unless it says don’t dry clean ( haven’t checked yet ). I bought one for my daughters room too.
customer_reviews.author: mrslewis

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this comforter and it fits in a duvet cover!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give all five stars but what can I say except this comforter is soft and just enough weight for winter but can be used tear round if you have A/C or especially central air! This comforter also fits in a duvet cover so I put it in a red and black checkered flannel duvet cover and the fit is Amazing! I bought the matching sheets here on Amazon because it all matched perfectly! The comforter was also just fantastic by it’s self!
customer_reviews.author: AnGie McKenna the expert shopper

customer_reviews.title: Super warm. Very fluffy for the "Pinterest Look"
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sound crinkly, very soft material altho could be a better quality material, super warm. We keep the heater down at 58° at night in the winter to save energy and because I'm a hot sleeper. This still keeps me SUPER warm. Almost too warm, but the hubs who is not warm natured also loves it. Very fluffy too which is what I wanted for that "pinterest bed" look. When I got it I put it in the dryer to fluff it with a damp towel and that worked great. I didnt notice any smell when I opened it either.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robotham

customer_reviews.title: Meh. This thing is flat as a pancake. ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. This thing is flat as a pancake. I don't know if I received something different than all these people raving about it's fluffiness, but mine is NOT fluffy. I figured since it's stuffed with cheap polyester they would go the extra mile and really pack it full, but nope. The only reason I gave three stars is because there is no chemical smell at all, which is important to me. I'm a hot sleeper anyway, so I'm going to keep it as long as it fits my cover that should be arriving in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO WAY !!
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow! If I could give this 0 stars I gladly would. This comforter wasn’t at all as it was described. We ordered a King and what we received was a full. Barely covers our queen bed. The material is poorly made, I could’ve purchased better at a 99 cent store. What a disappointment. Our new king bed is being delivered today, had to run out & buy a legit King comforter @ Marshall’s Home Good. Thank god we found one, $40!! I’d like a refund but I don’t have the strength or time to even ship this piece of crap back. False advertising & completely dumbfounded.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Super warm & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this blanket! It is so warm! I was a little skeptical since I have owned real down and know how warm it is and how light weight they are but this is just as warm and light weight! The softness of the outer part of the blanket feels like regular blanket material but inside you can feel how soft and silky feeling the down alternative is! I was hoping the outer would be soft like a down blanket but it’s not that worrisome! For the price, I can honestly say 100% buy this blanket!! You won’t be disappointed!! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: I figured I would take a chance on this comforter! I didn’t really know what I would get since it was so affordable. Turns out, I am very impressed with the quality and comfort. It’s fluffy but still light weight. Since this is for my teenage son, I choose to use a duvet cover so I wouldn’t have to wash the comforter as much. However, it would be great without a cover as well. I agree with the other reviews that if fluffs up once you wash it. I didn’t have any issues after my first wash. No bunching of the material. I hope it holds up well! I might actually buy a second one for our guest room!!
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years in and it still is in AMAZING condition
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blanket for 2.5 years now and it has held up Amazingly well!! I have 2 kids and 2 big dogs so it's gets washed often and it is still as soft and fluffy as the day I received it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marin

customer_reviews.title: Poofy, luxurious, floats on top of you and you can swim underneath all night.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. This comforter floats right over you, you can just swim under it. I bought a duvet so the duvet hugs onto me but the comforter stays floaty, making it not as hot. I am a polar bear. Some nights I sleep with my window open in the winter and I’m in Wisconsin. So far this blanket hasn’t made me hot. It’s warm, but not warm/hot. Feels airy so far. LOVE how poofy it is, I was worried about buying online but I’m definitely happy and satisfied. Feels luxurious and hotel like. Highly recommend and would purchase again. In fact I might just have to purchase some to share with family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yessssssss please
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this duvet insert. I can’t speak for anyone else but this is exactly what I was looking for. Something lightweight&fluffy but not super flat..something warm but not overheating ..it looks good and fills the duvet cover well. I washed it soon as I opened it and it fluffed up so nicely. It’s been about a month since I’ve been using it as an insert and it’s still fluffy and cozy.. that’s with me sleeping wild plus I have 3 dogs that let me sleep in the bed too lol . If you are looking for the same qualities that I was, give it a try. Let me tell y’all ...my bed is heavy for real lol
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This comforter has been used daily for 9 months and it is great! It did damage a little after the very first wash, with the material inside the stitched box bulking up a little. It does not seem to progress though and I wash it once a week. It is not that light weight, which is a plus for me, but I know some people would not appreciate it. It warms you enough to hold A/C during summer times and Florida type of cold weather. I have a full size bed and sized up the comforter for better fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: TRUST ME, THIS IS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed legit at first. Washed on cold gentle for the first time and it came apart in multiple areas. The stuffing is destroyed as well as the fabric! Ugh! >=***(
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping under marshmallow fluff
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my comforter!! It comes compressed with the air sucked out, so it looks small. Then you break that package seal and buddy, stand back. It's like a life raft inflating. It's super soft, fluffy, and the perfect weight that I was looking for. It looks great inside my duvet cover and it doesn't bunch of sag. It's perfect. It's so fluffy I'm gonna die.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Item!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service when buying any comforter/sheets from Utopia, this is the only brand that I get when buying Duvets and Comforters. Its very cool and thicker quality than the Ikea comforters. I use these all year round. Definitely great in the spring/summer/fall for when you need it in addition to your sheets. During winter I add a little heating blanket if my heat in the house isnt on. Otherwise, it does have heat underneath to keep you cozy when its chilly.
customer_reviews.author: KJL Taicho

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and super soft
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with the This duvet insert is lightweight, super soft and warm, without being too hot for our very tropical climate. It shows up packed tightly and expands quickly. I tossed it in the dryer for some extra fluff before inserting into the duvet cover. Very pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Vee

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried reading some of the reviews, but it was perfect. Just like the one I have from a high quality store. Worth the money and came really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn T

customer_reviews.title: Love it, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Really like it! I just ordered tons of new stuff for my room with graduation gift cards and this was on the list. If you like to sleep with it around 68F or have parents who like it to be around 68F, this comforter is great to keep you warm!! It’s really soft and I love the thickness, it’s also not heavy at all. I haven’t tried washing it yet because I’m afraid ( a lot of reviews say it tears ) so I just plan to hand wash it in the bath tub!! Hopefully they can fix the durability and end up getting more customers
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Insert Destroyed After One Wash
customer_reviews.text: This insert was decently comfy and soft, but two things that were super disappointing. One, it runs extremely hot so I couldn’t even put it in my duvet cover without burning up. And two, the most frustrating this is that after 1 wash it was destroyed!! Do they expect you to never wash this?? I followed the instructions and never even got to dry it because all the stitching came out and material was all over. So annoyed I spent the money on this, I hope the seller can give me a refund thank god I have a spare blanket in the mean time. I don’t recommend this product despite its great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Choudhuri

customer_reviews.title: Fluff everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this! When I got it, I was impressed with how soft and light weight it was. The color was also spot on. Unfortunately, my dog marked the comforter right away when I put it on the bed. So, I followed the washing instructions and there was fluff all over the washer after it was done. Unfortunately the seams didn’t hold together. Had this not happened, I would have totally recommended this product to anyone, but after this, it’s not worth the investment. Especially after one wash. :(
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my comforter today. I washed it in delicate cycle and dry it on gentle cycle. Making my bed I noticed a small hole on the comforter. I have a large capacity front loader for my washer and dryer. I never had a problem with any of my California king comforters. So I know it’s not from my washer or dryer. So disappointed! Update: I received the replacement blanket and after 2 wash the fuzz came out again. Definitely not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Mold.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to try this comforter after reading such great reviews. Y'all better feel terrible for lying to me. The comforter was in no way "fluffy" and it felt terribly cheap with a creepy dampness that left it limp. The worst part is the odd smell and MOLD (pictured below.) The mold was in several areas but mostly along the edges of the comforter. Don't buy this. One star for the crisp white color in places the mold wasn't covering.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: King size isn’t really a king size!!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason why I give this an overall 3 stars is that I ordered a King Size and whe it arrived, it just barely covered the top of my king size bed. I double checked the label in the packaging and it says king size, so this just runs exceptionally small. If you have a queen sized bed, the king size will fit it, but if you have a king, try a different vendor/brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: King is not a king size
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than a king bed. Barely covered the top of the mattress. Once I allowed it to sit and be ‘fluffed’ it was a grand total of like an inch thick, maybe! Really thin for a duvet. Fortunately Amazon is great about backing their products! I returned it and will be spending my money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Hot hot hot
customer_reviews.text: I really love the feel of it, I feel like I'm at a hotel every night! However, my husband thinks it's way too hot, and I have to agree. Last night we didn't have the heat on (Arizona high desert) and it was freezing outside, but I was sweaty under the covers and then freezing when I was out of them. It's very difficult to maintain a good temperature with this duvet. Disappointing because I was hoping it would be an all weather thing :/
customer_reviews.author: Ash Gundelach

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks very nice. Concerned about washing it
customer_reviews.text: I wrote the company after seeing all the bad reviews when people washed this. The response was to hand wash and hang dry. Really?? how do you hand wash this comforter. in the shower? I can't hang dry this outside in the cold weather. i haven't washed it yet so i don't know what to expect, but as its i am pleased with fabric, feel, color, etc
customer_reviews.author: Wayne DeJulia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: TRULY LIGHTWEIGHT! I’ve been looking for an insert that please both my love for comfy comforters and my husbands need for something that doesn’t make him Drench overnight. This is the one. I’m looking to purchase another for my guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: MissEtiquette

customer_reviews.title: sleeping in a big fluffy cloud!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my duvet. perfect fit ,warm, snuggly. aired it out for a day (probably not necessary) then washed it in cold water, dried on low. have to take it out during drying time, turn it to dry it evenly. don't be in a hurry about it. it's worth it because it really poofs up when dry. if the weather was cooperative, i would hang it outside to dry. it's too warm for flannel sheets so i just switched to regular cotton sheets. perfect! would order it again
customer_reviews.author: Jill Straw

customer_reviews.title: Really warm, soft, inexpensive comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter makes me feel like I'm crawling into a marshmallow, which is great. It's super warm, which is also great. I've always read that real down comforters keep you warm without making you sweaty, but that's not the case with this down alternative comforter, which I guess is to be expected since it's not the real deal. Overall though, it's a very light, soft, extremely warm comforter option. I'm pleased with my purchase of it.
customer_reviews.author: Schnarf

customer_reviews.title: Tiny - doesn’t fit my king size bed
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a comforter that will hang over my king size bed that I have and after looking and looking, finally cracked down and bought this one. I wanted to see if it would fit prior to washing and nope, only the top will it cover. Doesn’t hang over the sides. Super nice and light and comfortable, but too small. This would be perfect for a queen size bed. Mind you, I have a normal king size memory foam bed that I bought on amazon, so nothing atypical, the past couple of comforters just are not large enough as they state.
customer_reviews.author: Casperson/Tripi

customer_reviews.title: So impressed with this comforter insert
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a nice duvet insert but have always been resistant to paying $150+. Finally after my last comforter was beyond saving I decided to check out amazon. This duvet insert immediately caught my eye as it’s lightweight and very affordable. While I had concerns given the low price I figured it was worth trying out. I could not be happier with the value of this item especially for the price! I was so pleased with how fluffy the insert is while still being lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a new king size bed and previously had a duvet comforter. That comforter nice but we mostly left it at the foot of the bed, when we did pull it up on cold nights it would warm you up, sometimes too much. This unit is very light weight, nice quality and fits a king size bed very nicely, Hangs just at the bed rail of the bed frame and fits head to foot very nicely as well. You can keep this up on the bed all night and it is not too warm. Very pleased with it and the fit within the duvet cover we purchased. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Gross dead insects
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and thought I would give it a try dispose the negative reviews I read. When I received it I took it out and inspected it. I immediately saw dead bugs inside of the packaging despite the comforter being vacuum sealed. Will return and not buy from this company again. Just gross!
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it - I was in doubt, but glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical with the price of this to even purchase it, but after reading the other reviews - I decided it was worth a shot. I am entirely pleased with this purchase! The packaging sure fooled my husband, as it was packed so tightly and vacuum sealed to make it super dense for shipping, but release it from all that and it sure puffed and filled up. It is NOT super puffy which is perfect for us and the weight is just right for our midwest climate. If like me, you were having doubts, DON'T, for the price this duvet inset is A-OKAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mousketeersara

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter overall!
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting off buying a new comforter insert for over a year mostly due to laziness and the fact that I didn't want to spend an arm and a leg. My previous comforter got bunchy in places and would get really thin on one end and thick on the other. This comforter is AMAZING. It's boxed design keeps the filling where it should so it stays fluffy everywhere. It also comes with corner tabs which keeps it in place (if your comforter has adjoining loops). I run cold and my husband runs hot. This keeps me nice and toasty and he is also cool and comfortable. This is a great purchase and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pridja

customer_reviews.title: Love it...great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to see how I’d like this duvet insert overtime. It’s been 2 months and I love it. It comes in very nice packaging, good fabric and lightweight, but warm. I have never bought a non down comforter and I’m impressed and know it’s better for my allergies. Unlike many products...there was no strange odor or bad stitching. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this as a stand alone comforter. Reviews on here seemed good so I purchased. Well I slept on it last night and I’m on my way to return it. The material is polyester, I didn’t like the way it felt against my skin. Cheap material. This may work if someone plans on using it as a duvet, but by itself, def not! I am not a bed snob either, but this did not feel good. I think I will just stick to buying the better home and garden comforters from Walmart. Really wanted to like this, but huge disappointment :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITS LIKE A CLOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many such comforters over the years, and this is by far the best one ever. I live in South Florida and I turn down the AC at night to make for better sleeping. This comforter is on my guest bed, and I sneak in there whenever I want to take a nap or just have a peaceful night sleeping alone. It is cool, fluffy and comfortable. It has just the right amount of weight and never feels too heavy or clinging. AND the best part - no swishy noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jannette Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Good Autumn-Spring Duvet
customer_reviews.text: Both my partner and I live in Northern California and find this to be great for Autumn-Spring temperatures (including winter). I am normally very cold going to sleep and my partner is a very warm sleeper but suits us both! It is cosy and very light. We come from the UK where Duvets are common and this one is great. No issues with the size (we have a queen size which fits perfectly). Maybe less ideal for the summer and probably too warm then- but then sheets or blankets are really all that's required then anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this before the last comforter I bought, which I think was 3x the price and too small for my bed. I can't believe the quality of this product considering the price. It is so mushy and yummy. Very warm (we're having 20° nights right now in an old house with crappy heating, but I was warm last night). I wasn't fighting with my husband for covers either. The only problem is that now I dont want to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: I CAN NOT GIVE THIS ENOUGH STARS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is absolutely amazing. I have gotten the best sleep of my life since receiving this - I love the weight of it, the feel of it, i love everything about it. It has a different feel to it than any other comforter I've ever used, and I'll never go back to anything else. This deserves way more than 5 stars - thank you for a wonderful product. I am a mom of four young kids, and a good night sleep means everything to me. Truly a lifesaver. It keeps me warm, but never too warm - it's like it adjusts to your body to give you the perfect amount of warmth. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha CB

customer_reviews.title: DON’T HESITATE! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a duvet insert comforter that wouldn’t break the bank. We got this on prime day which made it even cheaper! Was a little hesitant bc of the price being so low, but glad we bought it. It’s not too heavy, but not too light either. It’s very soft as well. We previously bought a similar comforter from IKEA for $70, I think this one is just as good! Just received this today, so will Do an update after use and washing. The only issue we had was delivery. Instead of 2 days it took 6, which I’m sure that was bc they sold so many on prime day. But a guarantee is a guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but it doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: While this is a very nice blanket, I’m disappointed to say there are already holes developing in it after only ~3 months of use. I have followed the washing directions to a T, yet there are numerous spots like the one shown. Pretty upsetting as I really enjoyed this comforter, will probably have to replace it soon. Two stars because it’s still fairly nice, but I was really hoping it’d last longer than, you know... 3 months?
customer_reviews.author: Cool Guy

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Comforter Duvet Insert - Quilted Comforter with Corner Tabs - Box Stitched Down Alternative Comforter (Queen, White)
feature_bullets: COMFORTER DUVET INSERT - Queen comforter duvet insert measures 88 inches x 88 inches
BOX STYLE STITCHING - Crisp looking comforter with 350 gsm filling features piped edges with an elegant style box stitching that prevent the fill from shifting
SILICONIZED FIBERFILL - Extremely soft material with siliconized fiberfill alternative filling provides a comfy and cozy feel
CORNER TABS - The four corner tabs make it extremely easy to put on any duvet cover and secures the comforter in place
MACHINE WASHABLE - Machine wash in the gentle cycle with cold water, sun-dry or tumble dry on low when needed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars28,810 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
